hierarchybuilder-reveal-editmessage: Message used while editing with the hierarchy builder

hierarchybuilder-unusedpages: Text to be displayed as root node of unused page hierarchy (edit form)

hierarchybuilder-hierarchy-desc: Page Forms hierarchy parameter description (select form)
hierarchybuilder-pagename-desc: Page Forms pagename parameter description (select form)
hierarchybuilder-propertyname-desc: Page Forms propertyname parameter description (select form)
hierarchybuilder-collapsed-desc: Page Forms collapsed parameter description (select form)
hierarchybuilder-missing-page-name: Page Forms missing page name warning (select form)
hierarchybuilder-missing-property-name: Page Forms missing property name warning (select form)
hierarchybuilder-invalid-collapsed: Page Forms invalid value for collapsed warning (select form)
